author: Pavan Damai
text:
Wt a storyteller U r @prashanth_neel Sir🙌
Every scene of the film is huge💥.
That last dilogue from prakash Raj "If my father write this story from his perspective..that'd be a story of a Son making his Mother's good dream coming true".
That is LITERALLY Lit🔥 #kgf2 #KGF2review

author: Pavan Damai
text:
If u are a believer of Time, destiny and TrueLove then #RadheShyam gives you higest classic happy vibe ✅.
What a handling with love and destiny @director_radhaa Sir🙌🙌.
#RadheShyam is one of the best films that's come in last ten years in #TFI.
UNIQUE YET BESTEST.
 #SyamaSyama
